description:
This newly renovated and spacious studio features gorgeous balcony views of the East River. Walking distance from Grand Central

Private Balcony
Elevator

Walking distance from Grand Central Terminal
name: Charming studio with gorgeous views!
review: Jessica's home is beautifully decorated and very comfortable for 2. The neighborhood is convenient to the UN, where we had an event all week. It is surrounded by lots of interesting take out places, a few grocery stores and is not far from grand central station. There's even a yoga studio on the first floor. It was an extra treat during the "blizzard" to have access to Netflix! Jessica responded quickly and helpfully to all our questions. yiu should stay here!
